title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
VividSpark Agency is Hiring a Digital Marketing Specialist (Full-Time)

At VividSpark Agency, a dynamic digital marketing firm based in Denver, we craft bold campaigns that elevate brands in tech, education, and healthcare. We’re seeking a passionate Digital Marketing Specialist to join our innovative team and drive client success through strategic digital efforts.

Role Overview
You’ll play a key role in developing and executing digital marketing strategies that engage audiences and deliver measurable results. From managing paid ads to optimizing social media, your work will shape how our clients connect with their customers across platforms.

What You’ll Do
- Plan and execute digital campaigns across Google Ads, Meta, and LinkedIn, aligning with client goals.
- Use Google Analytics and SEMrush to track performance and identify optimization opportunities.
- Collaborate with content creators to develop compelling ad copy and visuals.
- Conduct A/B testing to refine strategies and boost ROI.
- Manage social media calendars for consistent brand presence.
- Prepare client reports detailing campaign metrics and insights.
- Assist in creating marketing budgets and forecasting outcomes.
- Stay informed about industry trends to keep campaigns innovative.
- Engage with client stakeholders to tailor strategies.
- Support cross-functional teams in integrating digital efforts.

Qualifications Needed
We’re looking for candidates with 2–3 years of experience in digital marketing, demonstrating proficiency in Google Ads, Meta Ads, Google Analytics, and SEMrush. Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills are essential, along with experience in A/B testing and campaign optimization. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities are required to work with teams and clients. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is necessary.

Why VividSpark?
We foster a culture of creativity and growth, where your ideas matter. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, blending remote work with in-office collaboration. We invest in your development through training programs, certifications, and access to premium tools. You’ll work on diverse projects that challenge you to innovate and deliver impactful results.

Benefits
Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
401(k) with company matching
20 days of paid time off annually
Professional development stipend
Access to marketing tools
Team-building events and wellness programs

Join Us
If you’re ready to spark change in digital marketing, apply today to join VividSpark Agency!
